hero_desc: Empowering rural farmers, connecting agents and urban consumers for a smarter market.
about_desc: Meret was built to address the challenges Ethiopian farmers face, connecting them directly to markets and reducing inefficiencies in the supply chain.

cards.title: Market Information
cards.desc: Farmers get real-time price updates and market trends to make informed decisions.

cards.title: Logistics Support
cards.desc: We facilitate transportation from rural farms to urban markets efficiently.

cards.title: Reduce Post-Harvest Loss
cards.desc: Our platform helps manage storage, inventory, and timely delivery to reduce spoilage.

cards.title: Farmer Organization
cards.desc: Encourages group coordination and collaboration to increase bargaining power.

cards.title: Fair Pricing
cards.desc: Ensures farmers and consumers get fair prices with transparency in the supply chain.

cards.title: Analytics & Insights
cards.desc: Agents and administrators can track produce flow and market trends to optimize operations.
